alert.note: Alert for La Salle; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 6:22PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern La Salle and northwestern McMullen Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 622 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Los Angeles to near Fowlerton. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Zella, Los Angeles and Fowlerton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
